attributes.action: Insist the Inidan government end the crisis in Jammu and Kashmir
attributes.additional_details:
Indian-administered Jammu & Kashmir has been under an  lockdown since India revoked Article 370, a constitutional provision granting the region special status. Allegations of  torture and Abuse have emerged in media,

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/asia/kashmir-crisis-latest-india-article-370-autonomy-torture-claims-planning-a9086611.html

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-india-49481180
attributes.background: On 5 August 2019, the Government of India revoked the special status granted to Jammu and Kashmir against the wishes of the residents. The Kashmir Valley is placed under a virtual lockdown with all communication lines cut and political leaders placed under house arrest.
